EmailTemplate.subject: Call for Papers – Tricentis Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We would like to invite you to submit a presentation proposal for Tricentis Accelerate 2015, this year’s must-attend conference specializing in Enterprise Software Test Automation. The Tricentis Accelerate conference provides a great opportunity to network and exchange ideas with hundreds of attendees from across Europe and around the world.
Speaker slots are 15 minutes long in total. To submit your proposal, please fill out the Call for Papers form here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/tricentis/images/C4P_Accelerate.pdf>, and send it back to us at accelerate@tricentis.com <mailto:accelerate@tricentis.com> by June 30th, 2015.
Thank you for your time, and we look forward to hearing your ideas. We hope you will join us in the beautiful city of Vienna, Austria for Accelerate 2015!
Best Regards,
The Tricentis Events Team
